page.title: 10FARMING SURVEY part three
page.content: Lower the prices of turkeys and flood the country with cheap foreign imports. Food surpluses were created and milk quotas were set up.This led farmers to cut back on production of crops and so farmers are making less profit. Nearly 1/3 of the farms in the area have beef cattle,another 1/4 have dairy cattle.Other livestock includes calves,turkeys,heifers,horses and pigs. Of all the livestock owned by local farmers pigs predominate accounting for 35.5% of the total livestock.All these pigs are located on 1 farm.Beef cattle account for 26.2%,dairy cattle 22.3%,young stock 15% of the total livestock.5.6% of land is used for dairy stock 16.7% for grazing,27.8% for grass,5.6% for fodder beet.
